description:
DO YOU WANT BUILD A COMMUNITY FORUM EASILY?
LEARNING THE LAST VERSION OF SIMPLE MACHINES FORUM 2?
AND YOU DO NOT KNOW HOW TO DO IT?

JOIN THIS COURSE AND MAKE YOUR PROFESSIONAL FORUM WEBSITE FROM SCRATCH!

Simple Machines Forum 2 — SMF in short — is a professional package that allows you to create your own forum with many powerful features for you as well as your community within minutes. SMF is an open-source project. You don't need any experience to take this course.

Throughout the course, we'll be building a handful of complete forum website step-by-step, personal or professional, and be transformed from a total beginner to a confident webmaster: I think you'll be excited to learn!

BUILDING CUSTOM FORUM SITE WITH SMF FROM SCRATCH course allows you to learn at your pace without spending entire days at a time away from the office or your college. This course includes basic introductory lessons to Simple Machine Forum package. You learn commands and techniques for creating a New board, Adding new Members, create Categories, Permissions, Smileys, Subcategory, and more with easy. You will become familiar with the Admin Panel, Theme customization, Adding Logo to your site, create the homepage, Managing your website, insert a Slogan and Avatar, creating a great community! Your professional Forum.

Why pay hundreds of dollars for build a Community Forum when you can receive with this course: high quality, interactive video, web-based Forum training at a fraction of the cost?

The course is presented via an intuitive, easy-to-use interface, allowing you to learn at your own pace.

ARE YOU READY TO LEARN THE LAST SMF SOFTWARE? AND BUILD A PROFESSIONAL COMMUNITY FORUM NOW!!

The course package:

- 17 video tutorials (about 3.20 hours total)
- 1 exercise tutorials: step by step, how create your community forum online
- Videos available, 24 hours on 24
- Learn when you want (every day or week-end)
- Build a Professional Forum Website!

The course outline:

- Introduction To SMF - Features - Lets Get Started - Admin Panel: categories, boards... - Themes and Layout Settings - Advanced Options - Exercise: build a community website "Computer Technology"
title: How to Build Your Forum from Scratch
